mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_BOARD.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO BOARD (BNO, MNO, BTITLE, BCONTENT, BDATE) VALUES (#{bno}, #{mno}, #{btitle}, #{bcontent}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT Z.*, NVL(LC.CLICK,'N') AS CLICK, NVL(RK.REPLY_COUNT,0) AS REPLYC, NVL(LK.LIKE_COUNT,0) AS LIKEC FROM ( SELECT Y.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS NUM, X.* FROM ( SELECT B.BNO, B.BTITLE, B.BCONTENT, BI.IMGPATH FROM BOARD B JOIN BOARD_IMAGES BI ON B.BNO = BI.BNO WHERE BI.IMGLEVEL = 0 ORDER BY BNO DESC ) X ) Y WHERE Y.NUM >= #{startIndex} AND Y.NUM <= #{endIndex} ) Z LEFT JOIN ( SELECT BNO, COUNT(*) LIKE_COUNT FROM "LIKE" GROUP BY BNO ) LK ON LK.BNO = Z.BNO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT BNO, COUNT(*) REPLY_COUNT FROM BOARD_REPLY GROUP BY BNO ) RK ON RK.BNO = Z.BNO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT BNO, 'Y' CLICK FROM "LIKE" L WHERE L.MNO = #{mno} ) LC ON LC.BNO = Z.BNO
SELECT B.BNO, B.BTITLE, B.BCONTENT, B.BDATE, M.NNAME, M.MNO FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MNO = M.MNO WHERE B.BNO = #{bno}
SELECT BR.RNO, BR.RCONTENT,BR.MNO ,BR.RDATE, M.NNAME FROM BOARD_REPLY BR JOIN MEMBER M ON BR.MNO = M.MNO WHERE BR.BNO = #{bno} ORDER BY RNO
SELECT IMGPATH FROM BOARD_IMAGES WHERE BNO = #{bno} ORDER BY IMGLEVEL
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM "LIKE" WHERE BNO = #{bno} AND MNO = #{mno}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD_IMAGES SET ISDELETE = 'Y' WHERE BNO = #{bno}
